title: Buk
description: Nancy's mother is having a baby and it is making her ill; Nancy's father is angry with her mother because they can't afford the baby; Nancy is angry with everyone.Then she starts to see things ... things that should only happen in fairytales. Is Buk a sign she is going mad or is he there to save her?Alice in Wonderland meets Oscar Wilde - a modern day fable.
author: Robin Bennett
